levels.description: Upon skill activation, places a Cluster Charge on the high-ground tile in front; causing 5 explosions on the passable tile behind it; Each explosion deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage to surrounding targets.<@ba.rem>Skill can only be used when this unit is facing a high-ground tile with a passable tile behind it; Can only be used 3 times per deployment</>
